name: Brandy Vaults
description: The exterior of the building can not be painted for any purpose other than for advertisements.
notes: Covers historic locally listed public house Brandy Vaults (now Tilley's Bar)

name: Dukes Cottages
description: No enlargements or alterations shall not be carried out upon Dukes Cottages unless permission is granted on an application made to the Council in that behalf.

name: Jesmond and Heaton
description: In certain areas of Newcastle, planning permission is required for to turn a house into a HMO (a house in multiple occupation).

name: HW Jesmond & N Jesmond
description: In certain areas of Newcastle, planning permission is required for to turn a house into a HMO (a house in multiple occupation).

name: Saint Gabriel's Estate, Heaton
description: In certain areas of Newcastle, planning permission is required for to turn a house into a HMO (a house in multiple occupation).

name: Northumberland Gardens
description: A number of changes to properties within this area are restricted in order to protect the character of the Northumberland Gardens Conservation Area.

name: Summerhill
description: A number of changes to properties within this area are restricted in order to protect the character of the Summerhill Conservation Area.

name: Saint Peter's Basin
description: Enlargements and alterations of properties in St Peter's Basin are restricted in order to protect the area.
